metadata.title: CVE-2022-31614 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager(vGPU plugin) where it may double-free some resources. An attacker mayexploit this vulnerability with other vulnerabilities to cause denial ofservice, code execution, and information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
